insert into sys_menu (menu_name, parent_id, order_num, url, menu_type, hidden, permission, icon, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, remark) values (#{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hidden,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=CHAR}, hidden = #{hidden,jdbcType=INTEGER}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, url, menu_type, hidden, permission, icon, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date, remark from sys_menu where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
